      • findLike

        @Query(value="SELECT u FROM User u WHERE LOWER(u.username) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\')) OR LOWER(u.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\')) OR LOWER(u.surname) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\')) OR LOWER(u.role) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\'))")

      • findLikeNoGroups

        @Query(value="select new lt.vtmc.user.dto.UserNoGroupsDTO(u.username, u.name, u.surname, u.role) from User u where LOWER(u.username) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\')) OR LOWER(u.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\')) OR LOWER(u.surname) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\')) OR LOWER(u.role) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?1,\'%\'))")

      • docTypesUserCreatesByUsername

      • docsToSignByUsername

        @Query(value="select distinct d, u.username, a.name, a.surname, dt.name from Document d inner join d.author a inner join d.dType dt inner join dt.groupsApproving g inner join g.userList u where u.username = ?1 and (LOWER(d.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(d.UID) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(dt.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(d.dateSubmit) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(CONCAT(a.name, \' \', a.surname)) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\'))) and d.status = 1")

      • docsByUsername

        @Query(value="select d, dt from User u inner join u.createdDocuments d inner join d.dType dt where u.username = ?1 and (LOWER(d.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(d.dateCreate) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(dt.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(d.UID) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')))")

      • docsByUsernameAndStatus

        @Query(value="select d from User u inner join u.createdDocuments d inner join d.dType dt where u.username = ?1 and (LOWER(d.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(d.dateCreate) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(dt.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(d.UID) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\'))) and d.status = ?3")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Document> docsByUsernameAndStatus(java.lang.String username,

        status -

      • statisticsByUsers

        @Query(value="select new lt.vtmc.statistics.dto.StatisticsUserDTO(a.username as username, a.name as name, a.surname as surname, count(distinct d.id) as docNumber) from User u join u.groupList g join g.docTypesToApprove da join da.documentList d join d.author a where u.username = ?1 and (LOWER(a.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) or LOWER(a.surname) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\'))) and (d.status = \'1\' or d.status = \'2\' or d.status = \'3\') group by a.username")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<StatisticsUserDTO> statisticsByUsers(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String searchPhrase,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Finds users document types that she/he was able to validate and calculates how many times each user that created this type of document, submitted v
        Parameters:
        username -
        searchPhrase -
        pageable -
        Returns:

      • statisticsByDocType

        @Query(value="select new lt.vtmc.statistics.dto.StatisticsDocTypeDTO(da.name as docTypeName, sum(case when d.status = \'1\' then 1 else 0 end) as submited, sum(case when d.status = \'2\' then 1 else 0 end) as accepted, sum(case when d.status = \'3\' then 1 else 0 end) as declined) from User u join u.groupList g join g.docTypesToApprove da join da.documentList d where u.username = ?1 and LOWER(d.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) and substring(d.dateSubmit, 1, 10) between substring(?3, 1, 10) and substring(?4, 1, 10) group by da.name")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<StatisticsDocTypeDTO> statisticsByDocType(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String searchPhrase,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String endDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Finds statistics data for user of his/her doc types that he can validate. For every document type of user, provided in parameters, returns count of documents with SUBMITTED, ACCEPTED OR REJECTED status that user can validate.
        Parameters:
        username -
        searchPhrase -
        startDate -
        endDate -
        pageable -
        Returns:

      • statisticsByDocType

        @Query(value="select new lt.vtmc.statistics.dto.StatisticsDocTypeDTO(da.name as docTypeName, sum(case when d.status = \'1\' then 1 else 0 end) as submited, sum(case when d.status = \'2\' then 1 else 0 end) as accepted, sum(case when d.status = \'3\' then 1 else 0 end) as declined) from User u join u.groupList g join g.docTypesToApprove da join da.documentList d where u.username = ?1 and LOWER(d.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', ?2,\'%\')) group by da.name")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<StatisticsDocTypeDTO> statisticsByDocType(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String searchPhrase,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Finds statistics data for user of his/her document type creating users stats (number of created documents).
        Parameters:
        username -
        searchPhrase -
        pageable -
        Returns:

      • countUsers

        @Query(value="select count(u) from User u where u.role = \'ADMIN\'")
int countUsers()
        Returns:
        count of users with admin role.
